TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MethodResponse extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class MethodResponse Implements IMethodReturnMessage, ISerializable
type MethodResponse = class interface IMethodReturnMessage interface ISerializable interface IMethodMessage interface IMessage

summary.span: 实现 接口来创建一条消息，该消息作为远程对象上的方法响应。

span.span: Implements the interface to create a message that acts as a method response on a remote object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个由于远程对象上调用的方法而生成，用于返回回调用方的方法调用的结果。A is generated as a result of a method called on a remote object, and is used to return the results of the method call back to the caller. 该消息包含返回值和`out`参数。The message includes a return value and `out` arguments. 类由.NET framework 远程处理基础结构。The class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework. 不需要创建的实例类直接; 请改用接口。You do not need to create an instance of the class directly; instead, use the interface. 包含的消息接收器末尾处的远程处理数据。 contains remoting data at the end of the message sink. 远程处理服务器返回到客户端的消息。A remoting server returns a message to a client.

param.span: 包含键/值对的远程处理标头数组。
